revision.text: ==Central Huasteca Nahuatl== ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|nch|/ʃaːmitl/}} ===Noun=== {{head|nch|noun}} # [[sweet corn]] tamale. {{c|nch|Foods}} ---- ==Central Nahuatl== ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|nhn|/ʃaːmitl/}} ===Noun=== {{head|nhn|noun}} # [[adobe]]. [[Category:Tlaxcala Central Nahuatl]] ---- ==Classical Nahuatl== ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|nci|/ʃaːmitl/}} ===Noun=== {{head|nci|noun|head=xamitl}} # [[adobe]] #* '''1555''', [[w:Alonso de Molina|Alonso de Molina]], ''[[w:Aqui comienca un vocabulario en la lengua castellana y mexicana|Aqui comienca un vocabulario en la lengua castellana y mexicana]]'', f. 8r. #*: Adobe de barro. '''xamitl'''. ====Derived terms==== * [[xanchihua]]
